Feline::
She stepped out of the CR tank and stood before Squizzy. "What do you 
think? Got a mirror?"

Squizzy::
She turned from her work bench and looked at Feline.  She dropped the 
beaker that was in her hand and stared at Feline. "Ah, oh boy. I 
think I did too good a job."  Squizzy glanced down at her own body 
and started to feel seriously out classed.  Trying to hide her own 
extremely low self image, she smiled,"Well, I think I'll need to arm 
you with a proton excellerator unit and a plasma rifle. And I'll call 
for a clean up crew."

Feline:;
She looked at Squizzy with a perplexed look on her face. "Uh, why all 
that?"

Squizzy:
"Because, the guys will be drooling in the  halls once they see you 
and the floors are slippery already. Second, You'll need to fight off 
the guys with a fight to get thier hands on you."

Feline::
She smiled at Squizzy's words.  She turned and looked at her 
reflection in the side of the CR tank.  She gazed in amazement at her 
reflection. She was now a stunningly beautiful black panther bot.  
She had soft black fur that felt like velvet to the touch.  She still 
had her tall, slender,beautiful female figure.  She smiled and saw 
her wonderfully white panther fangs. Her eyes were of saphire blue 
and her whiskers were long and sensual.  She turned and looked at 
Squizzy. "Thank you. I look and feel wonderful. Let me know how I 
could repay you."

Squizzy:
"Oh, it's nothing really. Go and do a test run. I'd be careful if I 
were you. You'll have half the males on the ship chasing you down the 
halls." she said with a chuckle. 

Feline::
She smirked. "I hope so. I do hope so." And with that, she turned and 
left the lab.  She walked down the hall and towards the bridge, 
hoping to run into a few bots to see what the reaction might be.
